Text: Re no subjectDear Paul This girl better be greatnothing less for you Tell her she must pass my inspection and remind you of meWhat do you think Why didnt your mother invite me to this partyIm going to be this weekend Unbelievable Have fun Love Aunt Kay

no subjectDear Paul Hope you are ok I keep hearing about Enron on TV and Im worried for you Ive had the flumy first time in years so Im grounded for a few daysIts been warm herethats the way I like it Take it easy I spoke to Allie and Jessiethey are cute to say the least Love Kay
